title: Post Office Reform, GOP Midterm Strategy
itunes:title: Post Office Reform, GOP Midterm Strategy
description:
Guests: Congressman James Comer, a Republican representing Kentucky's 1st congressional district, Bloomberg Politics Contributors Rick Davis & Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Bloomberg Technology anchor Emily Chang's interview with Disney CEO Bob Chapek.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
